name: Steel Bowyer

skills.name: Binding Arrows
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] for 2 turns

skills.name: Thrill of the Hunt
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Heals this Champion by 50% of the damage inflicted on each critical hit

skills.name: Big Game
skills.raw_description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases according to enemy MAX HP.

seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

seo.description: Steel Bowyer is a rare attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
